thread.title: Paula Anthony, PhD., Joins Next Wave Health Advisors

author: cnbc.com
title: Paula Anthony, PhD., Joins Next Wave Health Advisors
text:
Dr. Anthony’s extensive industry knowledge expands Next Wave’s wealth of expertise
SCRANTON, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Next Wave Health Advisors LLC, an affiliate of the Huntzinger Management Group, Inc., announced the addition of a new Advisor, Paula Anthony, PhD.
Dr. Anthony was most recently with the East Texas Medical Center (ETMC) Regional Healthcare System/UT Health East Texas – Tyler where she held numerous executive positions including Vice President and Chief Information Officer. Her long and successful career in healthcare information technology began with HBO & Company/Amherst Associates and included lead roles for Ernst & Young prior to joining ETMC.
“Huntzinger is extremely fortunate and pleased to have Paula join Next Wave Health Advisors,” commented William Reed, Huntzinger Executive Vice President and Partner, adding, “Her depth of experience further expands the wealth of expertise Next Wave Health Advisors can provide to our clients.”
About Huntzinger
Huntzinger provides IT advisory, managed, implementation, and staffing services to the healthcare industry. We focus on clinical and operational business performance optimization by ensuring alignment between IT, clinical, and ambulatory areas to position our healthcare clients for the future. For more information, visit www.huntzingergroup.com .
About Next Wave Health Advisors
Next Wave Health Advisors, LLC, a Huntzinger Management Group company, are the preeminent leaders in healthcare information technology. Our team of executives played central roles in forming the modern-day HIT landscape over the past several decades, setting the bar in HIT leadership, management, technology, information security, business intelligence and organizational development. For more information, visit www.nextwavehealthadvisors.com .
